name: Big Boy Chew
description:
My brothers and I built this game while participating in the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. This is only our second game jam, our first was 72 hours long. Having 24 hours less really makes the jam more difficult!

Instructions:

Left click to throw your massive "head" and reel it back to you.

Press 'a' to move left.

Press 'd' to move right.

Find all 10 gumballs while avoiding the enemies to win!

Art and Level Design: Hunter Bales

Programming: Thomas Bales

Programming: Connor Bales
